Title: Kirik Party
Writer: Rakshit Shetty (screenplay), Rishab Shetty (screenplay), Abhijit Mahesh (screenplay), Dhananjay Ranjan (screenplay), Kiranraj K (screenplay), Chandrajith (screenplay)
Actors: Rakshit Shetty, Rashmika Mandanna, Samyuktha Hegde, Achyuth Kumar
Plot: Kirik Party is the story of a gang of mischievous students, lead by the protagonist Karna (Rakshit Shetty), who has just joined an engineering college.
